I presented a poster on some ongoing work that uses tree ring data and forest inventory data at the Ecological Forecasting Initiative Conference at Virginia Tech last week!

This work outlines some options we are considering for data assimilation of forest inventory measurements into a tree growth model that estimated on \~16,000 cored trees in the North Eastern US.

Check out my poster below:
